_header: O seely anchor that in thy cell
_description: Charles d’Orléans, In the presence of his mistress — three 8-line stanzas (ababbcbc) and 4-line Envoy (abab), including ‘Wo worth’ anaphora

BLHar682.First Lines:
O sely Ankir that in thi selleIclosid art with stoon and gost not
                    out…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…Wo worthis me to be thus in absenceGo dull complaynt my lady
                    þis report
